name: Version-Focused Todo Templates
description: A collection of versioned todo app templates demonstrating version control concepts

messages.content: I need a todo app that helps me understand versioning concepts. Can you create something that shows different versions?
I'll create a version-aware todo app that demonstrates versioning concepts! This will have version tracking, changelog features, and visual indicators for different versions of your tasks.
This looks great! I love how it shows version history. Can you add more version control features?

Perfect! I've enhanced the app with advanced versioning features including version branching, rollback functionality, and a detailed changelog view. Now you can see how different versions evolve over time!
Could you also create documentation about version control best practices?

Absolutely! I'll create comprehensive documentation covering version control principles, best practices, and how they apply to project management. This will help you understand the concepts behind the todo app.
And maybe a visual diagram showing how versions branch and merge?
Great idea! I've created a beautiful SVG diagram that visualizes version branching, merging, and the flow of changes over time. It's perfect for understanding how version control works conceptually.
